message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable asset. I believe it's a great investment for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I think the price is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product.
I understand you think the price is a bit high, but I believe the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1050000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.
I'm willing to be flexible, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $1000000, which is still a great deal for you considering the product's value.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $925000 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll meet you at $975000, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $920000 for the product.
